description: Sergyo might have originally intended to have a relaxing day reading and sunning himself, but something far better came along -- and that something is Antonio Miracle. Antonio Miracle reminds me a bit of Viktor Rom: they’re both sexy-as-hell Latin men, they’re both as big as mountains, and they both have beautiful uncut cocks they love to use on pig bottoms. While Antonio allows for some versatility in his sex life (Sergyo gets a chance to fuck him) Antonio spends most of the encounter playing with and raw-dogging Sergyo’s ass. And judging by Sergyo’s enthusiasm, I’d say he’s happy with the arrangement.
title: Sergyo And Antonio Miracle | Versatile Ass Play
